uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.get

Class GetEntities<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.AbstractOperation<CloseableIterable<SEED_TYPE>,RESULT_TYPE>
      • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.AbstractGetOperation<SEED_TYPE,CloseableIterable<RESULT_TYPE>>

          • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.AbstractGetIterableElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,ELEMENT_TYPE>
            • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.get.GetElements<SEED_TYPE,Entity>
              • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.operation.impl.get.GetEntities<SEED_TYPE>
  • Type Parameters:
    SEED_TYPE - the seed seed type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    GetElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,CloseableIterable<Entity>>, GetIterableElementsOperation<SEED_TYPE,Entity>, GetIterableOperation<SEED_TYPE,Entity>, GetOperation<SEED_TYPE,CloseableIterable<Entity>>, Operation<CloseableIterable<SEED_TYPE>,CloseableIterable<Entity>>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GetEntitiesBySeed, GetRelatedEntities

    public class GetEntities<SEED_TYPE extends ElementSeed>
extends GetElements<SEED_TYPE,Entity>
    Restricts GetElements to only return Entitys. See implementations of GetEntities for further details.
    See Also:
    GetElements
